alert.note: Alert for Inland Southern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Osceola; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued June 03 at 3:37AM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM NOON EDT TODAY THROUGH LATE SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of east central Florida, including the following areas, Inland Northern Brevard, Inland Southern Brevard, Mainland Northern Brevard, Mainland Southern Brevard, Northern Brevard Barrier Islands, Osceola and Southern Brevard Barrier Islands. * WHEN...From Noon EDT today through late Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Inland Southern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Osceola; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands
